verses.name: Mark 5:1
verses.text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea, into the country of the Gadarenes.

verses.name: Mark 5:2
verses.text: And when he was come out of the ship, immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit,

verses.name: Mark 5:3
verses.text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs; and no man could bind him, no, not with chains:

verses.name: Mark 5:4
verses.text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains, and the chains had been plucked asunder by him, and the fetters broken in pieces: neither could any man tame him.
